about.title: About me
about.primary: I'm a motivated software engineer with a creative approach to solving complex challenges. My technical expertise is complemented by a strong sense of visual aesthetics, enabling me to create software that combines functionality with captivating design. Drawing from my experience as a medical responder, I excel in rapid assessment and response, highlighting quick thinking and adaptability. These skills seamlessly transition into software engineering, where I emphasize detail and problem-solving to craft life-enhancing solutions. My pride lies in my continuous pursuit of innovative problem-solving methods.

projects.title: JobJog
projects.description: Empowering streamlined employee onboarding and task delegation, our sophisticated platform integrates detailed task parameters, visual progress tracking via photos, and efficient clock-in/out for shifts. With secure user registration and login functionalities for employees and administrators, seamless AWS-powered media storage, and user-friendly interfaces designed with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python and Django, we've harnessed APIs for authentication, task management, media uploads, and progress tracking. Hosting on Heroku extends accessibility, ensuring our solution thrives online.

projects.title: Project 2
projects.description: Demonstrate in this description the skills of a programmer: such as having commitment, having perseverance and accepting alternative solutions. Remember that being a portfolio you are not selling the project, you are selling yourself, it reflects the resources used: Frameworks, libraries, platforms, etc.

projects.title: Project 3
projects.description: If the project was collaborative, reflect it in this description, that will demonstrate communication and/or leadership skills. Additionally, if you made use of the mastery of a second language, it will reflect on you professionalism.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: This is where you can describe about your contact. The more you describe about your contact, the more chances you have!
